name: Luxor Light Shifter for HTC Vive
name_original: Luxor Light Shifter for HTC Vive
description:
Submission for the New York 2016 VR JAM.

Bend and shape light in an ancient pyramid to eliminate the scarabs. Using two crystals, maneuver around the space to manipulate the light towards the target.
